name: Plane Shooter (ningo_games)
description:
this is a shooter game in which player is a red plane and you have limited health and you need to destroy as many planes as possible and collect coins as you collect more coins new types of enemy planes starts to spawn which give you more damage than the planes which are spawnning earlier

Controls

W / UP Arrow To Move Upwards S / Down Arrow To Move Downwards A / Left Arrow To Move Left D / Right Arrow To Move Right Left click To Shoot Bullets
